eas_text: A civil authority has issued A CIVIL EMERGENCY MESSAGE for the following counties or areas: Marion; Polk, OR; at 12:12 PM ON DEC 19, 2025 Effective until 02:12 PM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: Level 1 - BE READY to evacuate from Along Salem Mill Creek, Shelton Ditch and Lower Pringle Creek North of Mission Street.
